A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Pacing issues made the first half drag on and the second seem like a race to the finish line. An overabundance of humor seemed around the corner of every serious statement. Why act like Leia has died just to have her spend most of the rest of the movie unconscious? Not even the well choreographed lightsaber duels could save this film. Overall it felt more like a mediocre video game than a Star Wars movie.
